ug,Uganda,Weather,6001,1,749083919,Weather Live° - Local Forecast,Mosaic S.r.l.,https://apps.apple.com/ug/app/weather-live-local-forecast/id749083919?uo=4,0.0,4.55274,749,Weather,"With Weather Live°, planning your day-to-day activities is easier than ever before: simply choose the weather parameters you want to track, which layout you prefer, and view your customized weather forecast! Feast your eyes on the breathtaking weather backgrounds that make the forecast as visual as nature itself.
WEATHER AT A GLANCE
- Accurate forecasts for today and the week ahead with local times for multiple locations, worldwide
- Animated weather scenes reflecting weather conditions
- Bad weather warnings and alerts to give you a heads up about severe weather in your area
- Adjustable weather layouts — choose which weather parameters you’d like to see first
- Daily weather reports with important information.
INSIGHTFUL DETAILS
- Today's Min, Max and ""Feels Like"" temperature
- Pressure in inches, mm, kPa or mbar
- Precipitation and humidity info
- Wind speed and direction
- Sunrise/Sunset and Moonrise/Moonset time
- Golden hour and Blue hour
- UV and Visibility details
- Dew Point info
- Wind Chill
- Fahrenheit/Celsius and Miles/Kilometers
- 12 or 24-hour time format.
SIMPLICITY OF USE
- Useful weather widget: get the detailed temperature forecast and severe weather alerts right on your Home Screen.
- Handy Apple Watch app: view the current weather conditions and the forecast for the coming hours right on your watch face.
Get Weather Live° and be prepared for any weather!
Please note that some supplementary features in the basic (free) version are subject to limitations (ex. UV index, Sun and Moon, Visibility, etc.). These limitations are also subject to change.
Get Weather Live° Premium:
- 14-day hourly forecast
- Interactive weather maps
- Hurricane Tracker
- Lightning Tracker
- Lock & Home Screen widgets
- Min-by-min precipitation chart as a Live Activity
- Air Quality
- RainScope
- Ability to rearrange the blocks with weather details
- Ad-free experience.

Subscription payments will be charged to your App Store account at confirmation of your purchase.  Subscriptions will automatically renew and you will be charged unless auto-renew is turned off or unless you cancel at least 24 hours prior to the end of the current subscription or trial period.  Any unused portion of a free trial period will be forfeited when you purchase a premium subscription during the free trial period. The cost of renewal depends on the Subscription Plan you choose.
Subscriptions and auto-renewal may be managed by going to Account Settings after purchase or by contacting Customer Support.
IMPORTANT DISCLOSURES AND CONSENT

If you live in the European Union and wish to cancel your order, you may do so within 14 days. You can do this by following the process laid out in the Apple App Store. Please note and acknowledge: you cannot cancel your order or obtain a refund if you have downloaded the app and started using it (i.e. for example, by opening and using the App).
Privacy Policy: http://www.apalon.com/privacy_policy.html
EULA: http://www.apalon.com/terms_of_use.html
AdChoices: http://www.apalon.com/privacy_policy.html#4",2013-11-26T01:50:35Z,2025-11-12T09:52:08Z

Precipitation, temperature, satellite maps

ug,Uganda,Weather,6001,3,1531561063,Zoom Earth - Weather Forecast,Neave Interactive Limited,https://apps.apple.com/ug/app/zoom-earth-weather-forecast/id1531561063?uo=4,0.0,4.66667,9,Weather,"INTERACTIVE WEATHER MAP
Zoom Earth is an interactive weather map of the world and a real-time tracker of storms and hurricanes.
Explore the current weather and see forecasts for your location through interactive weather maps of rain, wind, temperature, pressure, and more.

With Zoom Earth, you can track the development of storms, hurricanes, and severe weather, monitor wildfires and smoke, and stay aware of the latest conditions by viewing satellite imagery updated in near real‑time.
SATELLITE IMAGERY
Zoom Earth shows weather maps with near real-time satellite imagery. Images are updated every 10 minutes, with a delay between 20 and 40 minutes.
Live satellite images are updated every 10 minutes from NOAA GOES and JMA Himawari geostationary satellites. EUMETSAT Meteosat images are updated every 15 minutes.
HD satellite images are updated twice a day from NASA polar-orbiting satellites Aqua and Terra.
RAIN RADAR & NOWCAST

Stay ahead of the storm with our weather radar map, which shows rain and snow detected by ground-based Doppler radar in real-time, and provides an instant short-term weather forecast with radar nowcasting.
WEATHER FORECAST MAPS

Explore beautiful, interactive visualisations of the weather with our stunning global forecast maps. Our maps are continually updated with the latest weather forecast model data from DWD ICON and NOAA/NCEP/NWS GFS. Weather forecast maps include:
Precipitation Forecast - Rain, snow, and cloud cover, all in one map.
Wind Speed Forecast - Average speed and direction of surface winds.
Wind Gusts Forecast - Maximum speed of sudden bursts of wind.
Temperature Forecast - Air temperatures at 2 meters (6 feet) above the ground.
Feels Like"" Temperature Forecast - Perceived temperatures, also known as apparent temperature or heat index.
Relative Humidity Forecast - How air moisture compares to temperature.
Dew Point Forecast - How dry or humid the air feels, and the point at which condensation occurs.

Atmospheric Pressure Forecast - The average atmospheric pressure at sea level. Low-pressure areas often bring cloudy and windy weather. High-pressure areas are associated with clear skies and lighter winds.
HURRICANE TRACKING

Follow hurricanes from development to category 5 in real-time with our best-in-class tropical tracking system. Information is clear and easy to understand. Our hurricane tracking weather maps are updated using the very latest data from NHC, JTWC, NRL, and IBTrACS.
WILDFIRE TRACKING

Monitor wildfires with our active fires and heat spots overlay, which shows points of very high temperature detected by satellite. Detections are updated daily with data from NASA FIRMS. Use in conjunction with our GeoColor satellite imagery to see the movement of wildfire smoke and monitor fire weather in near real-time.
CUSTOMISATION
Adjust temperature units, wind units, time zone, animation styles, and many more features with our comprehensive settings.
ZOOM EARTH PRO

More features are available through auto-renewable subscriptions. Payment will be charged to your App Store account at the confirmation of purchase. The subscription will automatically renew at the end of each billing period and be charged within 24 hours, unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. For further information, please read our Terms of Service.
LEGAL
Terms of Service: https://zoom.earth/legal/terms/
Privacy Policy: https://zoom.earth/legal/privacy/",2023-06-27T07:00:00Z,2025-10-27T12:30:07Z

ug,Uganda,Weather,6001,4,1347193162,Rainy Days Rain Radar,Hugo Visser,https://apps.apple.com/ug/app/rainy-days-rain-radar/id1347193162?uo=4,0.0,0,0,Weather,"Rainy Days is the fast and accurate doppler rain radar app. Rainy Days gives you all the freedom to pan and zoom on incoming precipitation, so that you can see where storms are heading at the detail that you like. Be your own weatherman with Rainy Days!
Rainy Days is best used for local weather
column2: the app uses multiple sources of data to give you the most up to date radar images based on the zoom level and location, whilst other apps use one big map for the whole world.

column1: Rainy Days uses actual radar doppler data and only falls back to satellite based data in areas where doppler radars are not available.

Rainy Days supports a large portion of the world, including US, Canada, Alaska, Hawaii, Puerto Rico, Australia, Europe, Scandinavia and Africa. Missing your area? Get in touch and I'll try my best to add it.
Note that Rainy Days only shows precipitation, not clouds!
Rainy Days is supported by advertisements which, if you prefer, you can disable with a one time in-app purchase.",2018-03-28T07:25:51Z,2024-02-20T13:35:47Z

ug,Uganda,Weather,6001,5,6748072328,Hygrometer Check Humidity,Hitesh Gajera,https://apps.apple.com/ug/app/hygrometer-check-humidity/id6748072328?uo=4,0.0,0,0,Weather,"Stay informed and prepared with Thermometer - Hygrometer, your simple and reliable tool to monitor real-time temperature, humidity, and air pressure using trusted weather station data.
Whether you're planning to go hiking, fishing, or just stepping outside, this app helps you understand your environment better—right from your iPhone.
Key Features:
Accurate Temperature: View current outdoor temperature in °C and °F.
Humidity Levels: Know the real-time humidity around you to stay comfortable and healthy.
Barometric Pressure: Get updated air pressure readings for weather awareness.
Discomfort Index: Understand how the current temperature and humidity may affect your comfort.
Auto-Location: Uses location (with your permission) to fetch nearby official weather station data for accurate readings.
Use Cases:
- Plan outdoor activities like hiking, fishing, or biking.
- Check humidity levels before using a humidifier or air purifier.
- Stay aware of pressure changes that may affect your wellness or mood.
App Highlights:
- Celsius and Fahrenheit temperature support
- Humidity shown in percentage
- Air pressure displayed in KPa
- Minimal, privacy-conscious design
- No personal data collected
Privacy Policy :

ug,Uganda,Weather,6001,6,1161387262,Windy.com,"Windyty, SE",https://apps.apple.com/ug/app/windy-com/id1161387262?uo=4,0.0,4.5,6,Weather,"A UNIQUE WEATHER FORECAST VISUALISATION

While most weather forecasting apps rely only on free global models, Windy has gone a few steps further and invested heavily in the most accurate models available, always at the highest possible resolution, to ensure accurate weather forecasts.
WEATHER RADAR & SATELLITE IMAGERY

A weather radar is the most requested tool for weather forecasting. To provide the most accurate radar imagery, we constantly expand our resources so that rain, snow, and storms don't catch you by surprise. Trusted sources include NOAA, Met Office, AROME, DWD, JMA, ACCESS, and others.
MORE THAN 50 WEATHER MAPS AND TOOLS
- Wind forecast (current speed, gusts, accumulation, models comparison, data from weather stations)
- Temperature, humidity, pressure, dew point, freezing altitude
- Rain, thunder, storms, precipitation type, CAPE-index
- Weather radar and Satellite images (blue, infrared, visible)
- Clouds, clouds tops, clouds base and visibility (LIFR, IFR, MVFR, VFR), fog
- Waves, swell, currents
- Solar activity maps (solar power, UV index, wet-bulb temperature)
- Snow depth, new snow, snow density
- NO2, PM 2.5, Aerosol, SO2, Ozone layer, Surface ozone, CO concentration, Dust mass
- Weather warnings & Extreme forecast
- Soil moisture, Moisture anomaly, Drought intensity, Fire Danger, Fuel Moisture
Available global weather models and resolution:
- ECMWF
- GFS by NOAA
- ICON by DWD
Available local weather models
- HRRR by NOAA
- NAM by NOAA
- HRDPS by MSC
- ICON-EU by DWD
- ICON-D2 by DWD
- UKV by British Met Office
- AROME-HD by Météo France
- ALADIN by CHMI
- NEMS by meteoblue
- MSM by JMA
- ACCESS-C by Australian BoM
CUSTOM WEATHER ALERTS
- Want to know about essential weather forecasts before everyone else? Set up a custom alert based on the weather in your favorite location. Whether it's wind strength, precipitation, or temperature.
HURRICANE TRACKING, STORM TRACKING

With Windy's hurricane tracking tool, you can track a hurricane's past and projected path. Windy doesn't rely on just one hurricane model but will give you all the forecasts available for a storm or hurricane.
WEATHER WIDGETS for iOS, iPadOS, MacOS

Windy serves up a quick weather overview on your iPhone, iPad, or Mac, as well as live radar by NOAA, Met Office, Meteo France, DWD, JMA, ACCESS, and many other trusted sources. You can choose from several view sizes and types. 3-5 day forecast, live weather radar, live satellite, or a simple lock screen overview.
TOOLS MADE FOR PILOTS
- 16 altitude levels from the surface to 13.5km/FL450
- 50k+ Airports searchable by ICAO and IATA, including runway info, decoded & raw METARs, TAFs and NOTAMs
- Detailed Airgram and Meteogram
- Thermals forecast
- Meteogram: temperature and dew point, wind speed and wind gusts, pressure, precipitation, altitude cloud cover
- Route planner
WINDY FOR APPLE WATCH
Forecast, radar, METARs, and wind information in a small, lovely package.
Use the Apple Watch face by Windy.com to have it all on your screen anytime.
Terms of Use: https://account.windy.com/agreements/windy-terms-of-use
Privacy Policy: https://account.windy.com/agreements/windy-privacy-policy
GET IN TOUCH with Windy
Join us at community.windy.com to discuss weather-related topics, report bugs, or suggest a new feature. Or contact us at info@windy.com on any topic.
FOLLOW Windy ON SOCIAL MEDIA
- Facebook: facebook.com/windyforecast
- X: X.com/windycom
- Threads: https://www.threads.net/@windy_forecast
- Instagram: instagram.com/windy_forecast
- YouTube: youtube.com/@Windyforecast",2016-10-31T20:29:54Z,2025-11-03T08:13:21Z

ug,Uganda,Weather,6001,7,490989206,Yr.no,Norsk Rikskringkasting As,https://apps.apple.com/ug/app/yr-no/id490989206?uo=4,0.0,5,1,Weather,"New Yr on iPhone and iPad is different from anything else you’ve seen in weather forecasting: Scroll through a beautiful and animated sky to see how the weather changes hourly, and get all the need-to-know details at the same time. And if there will be rainfall within the next 90 minutes we'll let you know through our now-cast.
The weather visualization makes it a fun experience to check the weather – even when it’s raining!
Check details day by day and hour by hour in the long-term forecast, or study the details in the graph.
Under ""Around you"" you get an overview of air pollution, pollen spread and UV forecast, as well as the latest weather observations in your area.
Forecasts are delivered by the Norwegian Meteorological Institute.

ABOUT US: Yr is a weather service jointly produced by NRK and the Norwegian Meteorological Institute. Our primary goals are to secure life and property, while delivering useful and accurate weather forecasts to our users, preparing them for all kinds of weather. This year we are celebrating our ten-year anniversary, and with millions of users every day we are proud of being one of the most popular weather services in the world.",2012-01-10T09:34:03Z,2025-10-06T08:52:19Z

ug,Uganda,Weather,6001,10,1531063436,(Not Boring) Weather,Not Boring Software LLC,https://apps.apple.com/ug/app/not-boring-weather/id1531063436?uo=4,0.0,4.80556,36,Weather,"~ WEATHER DOESN’T HAVE TO BE BORING ~
The simple weather app that’s winning awards (Apple Design Award, Best Weather Apps) and impressing tastemakers (MKBHD, Fast Company).
~ PLAYFUL YET FUNCTIONAL DESIGN ~

Turn your daily weather forecast into a memorable experience with a next-generation user interface design inspired by 3D video games. Feel the rain, hear the thunder, and watch the wind blow across your screen in vivid detail.
~ TOP WEATHER SOURCES ~
Powered by local data from the best weather sources like Accuweather, Foreca, Apple Weather, and the National Weather Service for the most local, most accurate forecasts.
~ MORE DETAILED ~
Explore every aspect of the weather for rich details on temperature changes, air quality (AQI), pollen reports, cloud cover, visibility, wind direction, rainfall, humidity, UV index, and much more.
~ MINUTE FORECASTS™ ~
Designed for precise forecasts down to the minute. Know exactly when the downpour will start or when the dark sky will clear.
~ WIDGETS ~

Bring real-time weather data to your home screen and lock screen with simple widgets. Get frequent updates on the day’s temperature, conditions, rain, air quality, UV index, and wind conditions as they happen.
~ SEVERE WEATHER ALERTS ~
Keep an eye on severe weather alerts and be prepared for the next heat wave, storm tracking, flood risk, hurricane, blizzard, and more.
~ MOON PHASES ~
Astronomical moon phases and illumination. It’s simple to see when the next full moon and new moon are expected.
~ AIR QUALITY & POLLEN ~
Prepare for the outdoors with air quality index (AQI) and pollen forecasts. See AQI scores and pollen levels over the coming hours or days.
~ CUSTOM APP ICONS & SKINS ~
Collect app icons and custom skins that change the design of the entire app to match your mood. New icons, skins, and artist collaborations dropping regularly to keep your routine fresh.
~ MINIGAME & SURPRISES ~
Say hello to Cloudburst to pass the time or see how many hidden surprises you can find.
~ FREE OR UPGRADE ~
!Weather™ is free to use for as long as you need. Upgrade for realtime widgets, faster forecasts, more in-depth weather data like AQI and pollen, free skins, app icons, and wallpapers.
~ SUPER !BORING ~
Become a member and unlock access to all 5 Not Boring apps, skins, app icons, wallpapers, and more. We’re 100% member-supported. No ads, no data tracking.
Plans: https://notboring.software/plans
Support: https://notboring.software/support",2021-02-15T08:00:00Z,2025-11-10T16:31:11Z

ug,Uganda,Weather,6001,11,1524430567,Wind Radar - Widget,Stolanapp,https://apps.apple.com/ug/app/wind-radar-widget/id1524430567?uo=4,0.0,0,0,Weather,"Turn your smartphone into a digital anemometer - Your essential companion for measuring wind accurately and to complement your weather apps.
A precise measuring tool:

Navigate the world of weather with our Digital Wind Meter app, a must-have radar, compass and map for all outdoor enthusiasts. Whether you're a surfing fanatic, an experienced sailor, or simply an outdoor enthusiast, our app gives you the ultimate in wind measurement and digital compass accuracy. Wind Meter is the favorite app for paragliding, skydiving, surfing, kitesurfing, hiking, sailing, fishing, storm chasers and weather geeks.
Wind Speed and Direction:

Our digital anemometer is designed to provide accurate measurements of wind speed and direction. Using advanced technologies, it allows you to know the slightest variations in wind, including gusts, which is crucial for planning your surfing or other water sports activities. The built-in satellite compass makes reading wind direction intuitive and easy.
Weather Alerts and Forecasts:

Stay informed with personalized weather alerts. Get notified each morning about wind speed and weather conditions for your location. Our built-in satellite weather radar lets you see current conditions and forecasts, helping you anticipate changing weather conditions, including hurricanes and thunderstorms.
Comparison and Mapping:

Easily compare wind speeds across multiple locations with our interactive satellite map feature. Whether you’re planning a surf trip or a boat trip, our app helps you choose the best location based on wind conditions.
Intuitive Interface:

The app features an interactive windmill that reacts visually to wind strength. With a user-friendly interface, it is suitable for both professionals and amateurs. It is also a favorite app for fans of paragliding, parachuting, surfing, kite-surfing, sailing, fishing, storm chasers and weather geeks.
Support for International Units:

Whether you prefer km/h, m/s, knots, miles, or even the Beaufort scale, our digital anemometer supports all international units, giving you complete flexibility in measuring wind, plus it provides a detailed explanation of what the Beaufort scale is.
Customer Reviews:
They downloaded our app and validated it, here is the feedback from our community:
'As an avid surfer, this app has revolutionized the way I choose my spots. The gust alerts and the accuracy of the weather data are incredible!' - Thomas
'Awesome! The wind speed alerts and weather radar have saved me from several unexpected storms.' - Sarah
Download the app now:

Download the Digital Anemometer now and turn your smartphone into a powerful wind measuring radar. With advanced features and a user-friendly interface, our application is the ideal companion for all your wind measurement needs. It will complement your favorite weather applications (The Weather Channel, Meteo France, Raintoday, Accuweather, Meteociel, etc.). If you like our application, don't forget to rate it and share your experience!
Customer Service:
If you need to report a bug or ask your questions to our customer service, you can write to us at: support@ipapps.dev, we will be happy to read you and answer all your questions.

Terms of Service: Apple's Terms of Service apply to all subscriptions offered within the app. More information here: https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula",2020-11-07T08:00:00Z,2025-11-12T08:14:45Z

ug,Uganda,Weather,6001,12,6744607846,Room Temperature Thermometer,Bhut Ravikumar,https://apps.apple.com/ug/app/room-temperature-thermometer/id6744607846?uo=4,0.0,5,2,Weather,"Room Temperature Thermometer – Accurate Indoor Temperature & Full Weather Insights

Stay comfortable and informed wherever you are! The Room Temperature Thermometer app is your personal weather station — right in your pocket. It not only tells you the exact room temperature, but also gives you a complete view of outdoor weather conditions, no matter where you are in the world.
Key Features:
Room Temperature Measurement

Know your indoor temperature in real-time using your phone’s built-in sensors. Whether you’re at home, office, or in a hotel room, get accurate readings instantly. Ideal for maintaining comfort, monitoring room cooling/heating, or simply being aware of your surroundings.
Current Weather Conditions
Get up-to-date live weather data including temperature, weather conditions (like clear, rainy, cloudy), and more — based on your current location or any city you search for.
Humidity Tracker
Monitor the humidity level of your environment. Humidity plays a big role in comfort and health — now you can keep it under control with accurate humidity readings.
Wind Speed & Direction
Check wind speed and direction in real time. Whether you're planning an outdoor event or just want to stay informed during changing weather, this helps you prepare better.
Dew Point Info
Understand how humid the air feels with dew point readings. A higher dew point means more moisture in the air — useful for weather-sensitive users or those with allergies.
Today’s Weather Overview
Get a detailed forecast for the day — including temperature highs and lows, sunrise/sunset times, rain chances, and more — so you can plan ahead with confidence.
Search Weather for Any City
Type and search any city worldwide to get its current weather conditions. Whether you’re checking weather for travel, family, or business, the app makes it easy.
Weather Charts & History
View easy-to-read charts showing temperature and humidity changes over time. Track daily trends or analyze previous data to make informed decisions.

ug,Uganda,Weather,6001,14,321934718,wetter.de Regenradar & Wetter,RTL interactive,https://apps.apple.com/ug/app/wetter-de-regenradar-wetter/id321934718?uo=4,0.0,0,0,Weather,"Mit der wetter.de-App hast du das passende Wetter immer dabei! Es erwarten dich tolle Features rund um das Thema Wetter.

Du willst wissen, wie das Wetter wird? Lohnt es sich, den Grill anzuheizen? Sommerliches Badewetter oder perfekter Neuschnee? Brauchst du einen Regenschirm? Wie wird die Temperatur und wie warm solltest du dich anziehen? Fragen über Fragen. Unsere Wetter App hat die passende Antwort parat. Du erhältst stundengenaue Wettervorhersagen für jeden Ort weltweit! So weißt du ganz genau, was dich erwartet und bist für jede Wetterlage bestens gerüstet.

Das reicht dir nicht? Kein Problem: Schau dir das Wetter für die ganze Welt in der 15-Tage-Vorschau an. So kannst du besser planen, was du für den Urlaub einpacken solltest und kannst jeder Wetterlage trotzen. Und wenn du schon dort bist – ob das Regenwetter einen Museumsbesuch oder der Sonnenschein historisches Sightseeing nahelegt, erfährst du bei uns.

Selbst wenn das Wetter mal schlecht ist, informieren wir dich darüber. Wo mit Unwetter, starkem Niederschlag oder Schnee zu rechnen ist, zeigt dir unsere Wetter App täglich und stundengenau an. So weißt du immer, wann du das Auto in der Garage stehen lassen solltest. Und unser Wetter- und Regenradar informiert dich darüber, wann genau du einen Regenschirm einpacken musst. Damit du auch immer auf dem neusten Stand bist, halten dich unsere Push-Nachrichten auf dem Laufenden. Ob relevante News, Hitze- und UV-Warnungen oder Unwetterlagen, wir informieren dich, wie du möchtest.

Direkt auf deinem Homescreen kannst du Widgets mit den für dich wichtigsten Wetterinformationen platzieren. Vom Regenradar über Sonnenauf- und untergang bis hin zu einem Countdown-Widgets für dein wichtigstes Ereignis hast du das im Blick, was dir wirklich wichtig ist.

Mit unserer Wetter App erwarten dich weitere individuelle Features und Wetterinformationen. Im Freizeitbereich kannst du dir die für deine Aktivitäten relevanten Wetterinformationen anzeigen lassen. Du willst grillen oder doch lieber baden gehen? Du wanderst gerne? Platziere im Bereich Freizeit die für dich wichtigsten Freizeitwidgets. Dort findest du auch umfangreiche, wetterabhängige Gesundheitsinformationen. Bist du geplagt von Allergien? Behalte den Pollenflug im Auge. Und wenn du bei Vollmond schlecht schläfst: Unsere Wetter App zeigt dir die jeweilige Mondphase an.

Du hast Fragen oder Feedback zur App oder etwas funktioniert nicht, wie es soll? Wir freuen uns auf deine E-Mail an appfeedback@wetter.de. Bei Problemen schick uns gerne detaillierte Informationen und Screenshots.
Nutze uns auf dem Smartphone, Tablet oder der Watch oder besuch uns auch auf unserer Website www.wetter.de!",2010-02-18T04:18:19Z,2025-11-11T16:31:58Z

CHANGE THE TIME
In the settings, you can switch between ‘Your time’ and ‘Local time.’ To switch between them, click the ‘Your time’ and ‘Local time’ options on the clock's hour section.
ADD LOCATION ON APPLE WATCH
It’s handy to know that the first location added to your list is set as the location on your Apple Watch. To edit or change this, you can reorder the cities in your location overview on your iPhone.
CHANGE MY BACKGROUND VIDEO
Unfortunately, you can’t manually select a video to play as a background. The app selects a random video from a pool of weather videos that match the weather for the report you’re currently viewing.
You can expand this pool of videos by unlocking videos in the menu screen, which is done by watching a short ad per video.

ug,Uganda,Weather,6001,24,595482076,HD Thermometer ⊎,Christophe Pereira,https://apps.apple.com/ug/app/hd-thermometer/id595482076?uo=4,0.0,4.77778,9,Weather,"Simple and beautiful rustic style Thermometer now in your iPhone or iPad.
What people say about HD Thermometer ⊎:

- It is a great app! It shows the temperature of your current location. That does not mean that your phone becomes a thermometer and can read the temperature of the surrounding area, using a weather service. A lot of idiots download this app and complain that their phone can't read the temperature indoors. Of course it can't! It's a phone, and no matter what app or other software you install on it, it will never be able to read the temperature of its immediate surroundings unless you had some hardware already installed that can do so, and a touch-screen phone simply cannot take someone's temperature.
by jefffafa123

- Gets the temp for your current location, or for other saved locations. Works very well. I previously used another thermometer app, but it had banner ads that you couldn't close, and they covered the temperature if it dropped low enough. This one has a nice clean interface and easy to use!
by AndyLPhoto
- It is very accurate and is really easy to use and control. I recommend using this app!
by AwesomeV01
- Very nice. Very simple. I like the auto save feature and the ability to just flip through the pages to get where you want.

Accurate Local Forecasts – Get the most accurate weather forecast right in your neighbourhood. Plan everything with our Hourly Forecast, 7-day, and long-range 14-Day Forecast, with real-time updates every 15 minutes.

Live Radar Maps – When a storm is on the move, track it precisely on our advanced live radar and Satellite Maps. Our GPS Weather technology shows you what’s happening right over your Current Location. Explore multiple map layers including temperature forecasts, precipitation forecast, wind forecast, fire & smoke, cloud cover, and highway conditions.

Severe Weather Alerts  – Your Outdoor Safety comes first. Receive instant Custom Notifications for all types of Severe Weather. Get Severe Storm Alerts, Lightning Alerts, Snow & Rain Alerts, and Temperature Swing Alerts, including official government warnings for your location.
Precipitation Start & Stop Times – Never get caught in the rain or snow again! Our precipitation graphs show you exactly when rain or snow will start and stop, accurate to the minute.
Health & Weather Reports – Essential for outdoor planning, our detailed reports on Air Quality, UV Index, and allergy risks for your Nearby Weather conditions help you prepare for your day.
Weather News & Video – Go beyond the forecast with breaking news and analysis from our weather experts.
Customizable Weather Widget – Get a quick glance at today's forecast. Add our customizable widget to your home or lock screen for instant weather updates.
Siri Shortcuts – Get quick access to your most-used weather features.
Bilingual Weather (English / French) – Full support in both English and French.
Go Ad-Free – Your forecast, simplified.  A completely ad-free experience.. Subscribe today.
